üß± **Flexible 3D Modeling**: Design and visualize objects, components, and structures in three dimensions using solid, surface, and mesh modeling capabilities.

## About AutoCAD
AutoCAD, developed by Autodesk, is the foundational and most widely recognized computer-aided design (CAD) software in the world. Since its introduction, it has set the standard for digital drafting and design across countless industries, including architecture, engineering, construction, manufacturing, and product design. Its core strength lies in its powerful 2D drafting environment, which provides unparalleled precision for creating blueprints, technical diagrams, and detailed plans. Over the decades, it has evolved to include robust 3D modeling tools, allowing users to transition seamlessly from concept to construction documentation within a single, trusted application. Mastery of AutoCAD is considered an essential skill for design and engineering professionals globally.

The software's enduring dominance is supported by its extensive customization and automation capabilities through APIs like AutoLISP, .NET, and more. This allows firms and individuals to tailor AutoCAD to their specific workflows, creating custom commands, routines, and even entire vertical applications. Furthermore, its DWG file format is the de facto standard for CAD data exchange, ensuring compatibility with a vast ecosystem of specialized tools and disciplines. Coupled with features like dynamic blocks, parametric constraints, and cloud collaboration through Autodesk's platform, AutoCAD remains not just a drafting tool, but a versatile platform for turning innovative ideas into precise, actionable plans and models.

---

## ‚ú® AutoCAD Advantages
‚úî **Industry Standard & Compatibility**: The universal choice with .DWG file format ensuring seamless collaboration across firms and disciplines.
‚úî **Highly Customizable**: Automate repetitive tasks and create specialized tools with APIs and a massive library of third-party applications.
‚úî **Cross-Discipline Versatility**: A flexible core platform used in architecture, MEP, mechanical design, electrical engineering, and more.

## ‚öôÔ∏è System Requirements
*   **Processor**: 2.5‚Äì2.9+ GHz 64-bit processor (basic) / 3+ GHz (recommended).
*   **Memory**: 8 GB RAM minimum (16 GB recommended).
*   **Storage**: 10 GB of free disk space for installation.
*   **Graphics**: 1 GB GPU with 29 GB/s Bandwidth and DirectX 11 compatible (4 GB GPU with 106 GB/s Bandwidth recommended).
*   **Display**: 1920x1080 True Color display (3840x2160 recommended on Windows, 2880x1800 on macOS).

---

## üìà Use Cases
*   **Architects & Civil Engineers**: Create detailed construction documents, site plans, and architectural drawings.
*   **Mechanical Engineers & Designers**: Draft machine parts, assemblies, and manufacturing schematics.
*   **Electrical & MEP Engineers**: Design wiring diagrams, circuit layouts, and plumbing/mechanical systems.
